attributes.action: Nullify the Brexit vote due to inadequate voter info/ foreign Power interference
attributes.additional_details:
The referendum vote was misinformed and manipulated. No-one wants to be complicit in a Brexit outcome deemed highly desirable by a hostile foreign power.

Evidence
1. https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2018/jun/17/why-isnt-there-greater-outrage-about-russian-involvement-in-brexit
 2. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russian_interference_in_the_2016_Brexit_referendum
3. https://www.euronews.com/2019/04/12/swiss-court-overturns-result-of-2016-marriage-tax-referendum-over-misleading-claims
attributes.background: Appreciable public domain evidence exists indicating Russia meddled in the Brexit vote as well as the US Presidential election. It is also apparent the British Electorate was not given the full facts when the Brexit referendum took place in June 2016. In combination, these invalidate the vote.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action and we are not exactly sure what you mean by "nullify" the result. 

If you mean revoke article 50, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/241584

You might also like to sign and share these petitions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/241848
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/239406
